title: Minnesota lawmaker proposes a recycling fix for a sea of leftover boat shrink wrap - Star Tribune
summary: State Rep. Larry Kraft introduced a boat wrap recycling bill that aims to reduce plastic waste in Minnesota by requiring producers to collect and recycle the material. Industry statistics show that Minnesota has a high number of boats per capita, leading to substantial amounts of waste each year. Efforts are being made to find innovative recycling solutions for the plastic material.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 326199 - All Other Plastics Product Manufacturing, 562920 - Materials Recovery Facilities, 562111 - Solid Waste Collection, 562219 - Other Nonhazardous Waste Treatment and Disposal
